title: [Phase 0] Development Setup
description:
Foundational project setup for Unified Beads WebUI. Includes project scaffolding, development environment, CI/CD pipeline, code quality standards, and documentation.

## Objectives
1. Initialize project scaffolding
2. Configure development environment
3. Set up CI/CD pipeline
4. Establish code quality standards
5. Document development workflow

## Duration
1 day (8-12 hours)

## Success Criteria
- `bun dev` starts without errors
- `bun run check` passes with 0 errors
- `bun run lint` passes with 0 errors
- Pre-commit hooks trigger on commit
- CI pipeline passes on push
- `bd --version` returns version
- `bd sql "SELECT 1"` returns 1

title: Project scaffolding - Initialize SvelteKit project
description: Initialize SvelteKit project with Bun, add core dependencies (Tailwind CSS v4, lucide-svelte, better-sqlite3, mysql2, svelte-dnd-action, ws, chokidar, execa), configure SvelteKit adapter-node, set up Vite with Tailwind CSS v4 plugin, create directory structure.

title: Development environment configuration
description: Set up VS Code extensions and settings, create .env.example with all required environment variables, document required tools (Bun 1.1+, Node.js 20+, Git 2.40+, Docker 24+).

title: Code quality standards setup
description: Configure ESLint with flat config, TypeScript, Svelte and Prettier integration. Set up Prettier with svelte and tailwindcss plugins. Configure strict TypeScript settings in tsconfig.json.

title: Pre-commit hooks setup
description: Install and configure Husky, lint-staged, and commitlint. Create pre-commit hook for lint-staged, configure commit message convention with conventional commits format.

title: CI/CD pipeline setup
description: Create GitHub Actions workflows for CI (lint, test-unit, test-e2e, build) and Release (tag-based releases). Configure Bun setup action, codecov integration, artifact uploads.

title: Storybook setup for component documentation
description: Initialize Storybook with SvelteKit, configure essentials addon, a11y addon. Set up stories directory structure for component documentation.

title: [Phase 5] Gas-Town Integration
description: Full multi-agent orchestration. 4-week duration covering: Gas-Town detection and configuration, agent monitoring dashboard, convoy tracking, mail system integration, SQL explorer.

title: 5.1 Gas-Town Detection
description: Detect Gas-Town installation via gt --version, town status via gt status --json --fast. Config parsing, feature flag integration, graceful degradation when not installed. Shows Gas-Town features only when available.

title: 5.6 Scene/Wave Orchestration (Post-MVP)
description: REQUIRES FURTHER REFINEMENT - Backend support unclear. Orchestrate work across multiple agents in waves. SceneBuilder.svelte, WaveEditor.svelte, dependency-aware wave ordering. Deferred until Phase 5 implementation begins.

title: 5.9 Multi-rig Support (Post-MVP)
description: Manage multiple rigs simultaneously. Rig selector dropdown, rig comparison view, cross-rig issue assignment, rig health monitoring, rig configuration UI. Deferred to post-MVP.

title: 5.10 Merge Queue Visualization (Post-MVP)
description: MergeQueue.svelte for coordinated merges. Queue item cards, position indicator, ETA calculation, reorder capability. Deferred to post-MVP.

title: 5.12 Cross-Project View (Post-MVP)
description: View issues across multiple projects. Project selector, unified issue view, per-project filtering, cross-project search. Deferred to post-MVP - design supports future multi-project.

title: 5.2 gt CLI Integration
description: GasTownCLI wrapper class mapping all gt commands: status, doctor, rig list/status/start/stop, polecat list/status, sling, convoy list/status/create, mail inbox/send/read. JSON output parsing, error handling, timeout handling.

title: 5.3 Agent Monitoring Dashboard
description: AgentDashboard.svelte, RigCard.svelte, PolecatCard.svelte components. Status indicators (working/stalled/zombie), quick actions (start/stop/nuke), auto-refresh (30s). Shows all rigs and polecats, current issue per polecat.

title: 5.4 Convoy Tracking
description: ConvoyList.svelte, ConvoyCard.svelte, ConvoyDetail.svelte components. Progress visualization, status filtering, create convoy modal. Lists convoys, shows progress, links to constituent issues.

title: 5.5 Mail System Integration
description: MailInbox.svelte, MailMessage.svelte, ComposeMail.svelte for agent-to-human communication. Unread badge in header, mark as read, reply functionality. Real-time updates via WebSocket.

title: 5.7 Knowledge Panel (Memory)
description: KnowledgePanel.svelte for browsing agent memory and knowledge base. Memory file browser (.beads/memory/), content viewer (markdown), search within memory, link memory to issues.

title: 5.8 SQL Explorer
description: SQLExplorer.svelte for advanced SQL queries. Query editor with syntax highlighting, results table with sorting, query history, save favorites, export CSV/JSON. Execute SELECT queries <500ms.

title: 5.11 Project Tags
description: Tag management UI for tag-based project organization. Create/edit/delete tags, filter by tags, tag colors, bulk tag operations. Tags visible on cards.

title: WebSocket Subscription Model for Gas-Town
description: Per-channel WebSocket subscriptions for Gas-Town events. Subscribe to gastown:status, gastown:rigs, gastown:rig:{name}, gastown:polecats, gastown:convoys, gastown:mail. Server-side routing with wildcard matching.

title: [Phase 3] Git Integration
description: PR management, worktrees, and dependency visualization. 3-week duration covering: worktree listing, PR management via gh CLI, CI status display, dependency graph, batch operations.

title: 3.1 Worktree Listing
description: WorktreeList.svelte and WorktreeCard.svelte components. Display git worktrees with branch, path, head, isMain, beadsRedirect status. Fetch via bd worktree list --json, status via git status --porcelain. Click to open in terminal/editor.

title: 3.10 Enhanced Kanban Drag-and-Drop
description: Multi-card selection with shift-click, drag multiple cards, drop zone highlighting, keyboard-accessible reorder. Drag selection changes status, visual feedback during drag.

title: 3.11 Batch Issue Creation
description: BatchCreateModal.svelte with markdown list input. Parse titles from lines, apply common properties (labels, priority), create via bd create loop. Progress indicator during creation.

title: 3.12 Related Tasks Links
description: Related section in issue detail showing blocks/blocked_by/relates_to. Quick-add related task, navigate to related task, remove relation via bd dep add/remove.

title: 3.13 Gantt Drag/Resize (moved from Phase 2)
description: Interactive Gantt bar manipulation. Drag bar to change dates, resize bar to change duration, update via bd update --due. Visual feedback, snap to day/week grid, optimistic update with rollback, undo support (Ctrl+Z).

title: GitHub CLI Authentication Flow
description: Implement gh auth status checking, browser-based OAuth flow, and headless device-code flow for servers. Poll gh auth status, show device code UI, handle auth-failed errors. Circuit breaker for rate limiting.

title: 3.2 Worktree Status (Ahead/Behind)
description: Ahead/behind badge on worktree card showing divergence from main. Tooltip with commit count, warning for divergent branches. Fetch via git rev-list. Shows '↑3 ↓2' format, updates on fetch/pull.

title: 3.3 Dependency Graph (Basic) - Force-directed visualization
description: DependencyGraph.svelte using D3.js d3-force. Node coloring by status, edge styling by type (blocks/blocked_by/relates_to), zoom/pan controls. Fetch via bd dep tree --json. Performance: <500ms for 50 nodes, Web Worker for >100 nodes, progressive loading.

title: 3.4 Dependency Arrows on Kanban
description: Arrow indicators on blocked cards, hover to see blockers, click to navigate. Arrow styling (dashed for relates_to). Blocked cards show red indicator, blocking cards show outgoing arrow.

title: 3.5 PR Listing - GitHub PR integration
description: PRList.svelte and PRCard.svelte components. Fetch via gh pr list --json, filter by state (open/closed/merged), link PR to Beads issues. Shows author, branch, status, checks, reviewStatus, linkedIssues.

title: 3.6 PR Create - Create PRs from UI
description: CreatePRModal.svelte with branch selector, title/description fields, auto-link current issue. Create via gh pr create. Pre-fills title from branch/issue, description template support, handles errors.

title: 3.7 PR Merge - Merge PRs from UI
description: Merge button on PR card, merge strategy selector (merge/squash/rebase), confirmation dialog, delete branch option. Merge via gh pr merge. Only shown for mergeable PRs, shows conflicts warning.

title: 3.8 CI Status Display
description: CIStatusBadge.svelte showing pass/fail/pending (✓/✗/○). Fetch via gh pr checks, hover for check details, click to view on GitHub. Shows on PR cards and linked issue cards, updates periodically (30s), color coded.

title: 3.9 Merge Conflict Alerts
description: Conflict indicator on PR card, conflict details on hover, notification on conflict detection. Red warning icon, shows conflicting files, links to resolution docs.

title: [Phase 1] MVP Core
description:
Basic functional UI with issue management. 4-week duration.

## Deliverables
- ProcessSupervisor with circuit breaker

- All commits must be atomic with conventional format
- Coverage target: >70%

- [ ] watches .beads/*.jsonl files
- [ ] emits change event when file modified
- [ ] debounces rapid changes (100ms)

- [ ] handles watcher errors gracefully

### WebSocketServer.test.ts
- [ ] accepts client connections
- [ ] broadcasts file:changed events to all clients
- [ ] broadcasts issues:changed events
- [ ] handles client disconnection
- [ ] supports multiple concurrent clients

### useRealtime.test.ts (Client Hook)
- [ ] connects to WebSocket server on mount
- [ ] reconnects on disconnect
- [ ] calls onchange when issues:changed received
- [ ] calls onfilechange when file:changed received
- [ ] disconnects on unmount
- [ ] handles connection errors

### Integration Tests
- [ ] file change propagates to client within 1s
- [ ] client receives correct event payload
- [ ] multiple clients receive same event

## Implementation Notes

- Record WebSocket vs SSE decision using `adrs new "Real-time Communication Protocol"`
- Use dependency injection for file watcher (ADR-0010)

title: 4.1 Terminal Drawer - xterm.js integration
description: TerminalDrawer.svelte with xterm.js integration. FitAddon for auto-sizing, WebLinksAddon for clickable links, SearchAddon for output search. Copy/paste support, keyboard shortcut to toggle (`). Resizable drawer height, auto-scroll.

title: 4.10 Agent Config UI
description: AgentConfig.svelte for configuring agent behavior. Default prompts per issue type, auto-approve rules, timeout settings, worktree preferences. Settings persist in local storage, per-project configuration.

title: 4.11 Interaction History
description: Interaction log viewer showing human-agent interactions. Filter by session/issue, approval/rejection history, analytics on approval rate.

title: WebSocket Server Architecture
description: Implement WebSocket server via SvelteKit hooks + ws library. Connection management with client tracking, broadcast functionality, session-specific events, client reconnection with exponential backoff.

title: 4.2 Agent Session Launch
description: LaunchAgentModal.svelte and session manager service. Launch via claude CLI, worktree selection, custom prompt input, session state tracking. Single focused session model - only one active session at a time.

title: 4.3 Session Output Streaming
description: PTY integration for live output, ANSI color support, output buffering, scroll-to-bottom behavior, pause/resume scrolling. Output appears <100ms after generation, colors render correctly, large outputs don't freeze UI.

title: 4.4 Agent History View
description: AgentHistory.svelte showing past agent sessions. Session list with filters, view past session output, session metadata (duration, outcome), link to issue.

title: 4.5 Verification Queue
description: VerificationQueue.svelte and VerificationItem.svelte for agent outputs awaiting human verification. Queue badge showing pending count, filter by type/status, sort by age. Items link to session.

title: 4.6 Approve/Reject Workflow
description: Approve button with confirmation, reject button with reason input, diff viewer for code changes, commit message preview, quick approve keyboard shortcut. Approve commits/pushes changes, reject reverts changes.

title: 4.7 ReTake (Retry) Workflow
description: ReTake button on rejected items, modified prompt input, preserve context option, new session creation linking old and new sessions. Retry count tracked.

title: 4.8 Claude Planning Integration
description: Plan viewer component showing Claude's plan steps, step status tracking, manual step override, plan modification. Steps update as completed, can skip/modify steps, saves modifications.

title: 4.9 Session Persistence/Resumption
description: Session state serialization, resume button for paused sessions, context restoration, output history retrieval. Sessions survive page refresh, can resume paused sessions.

title: [Phase 2] Analytics & Timeline
description: Lean metrics and Gantt visualization. 3-week duration covering: Metrics engine, CFD/Lead Time/Throughput/Aging WIP charts, health status badges, date prefix parsing, Gantt chart.

title: 2.1 Metrics Engine - Lean/Kanban calculations
description: Core calculation engine for lean metrics. Implement calculateLeadTime, calculateCycleTime, calculateThroughput, calculateCFD, calculateAgingWIP, calculatePercentiles. Calculations match beads-dashboard, exclude wisps, <500ms for 1000 issues.

title: 2.10 Hierarchical Sorting
description: Sort comparator function for issues. Sort by parsed date prefix, sub-sort by parent/child relationship, sub-sort by priority. Earlier dates first, children follow parents, stable sort order.

title: 2.11 Gantt Chart (Basic) - Timeline visualization
description: GanttChart.svelte and GanttBar.svelte components. Time axis (weeks/months), issue rows with bars, horizontal/vertical scrolling, zoom, today marker. Bars positioned by date prefix, bar length reflects duration.

title: 2.13 Due Date Management
description: Due date picker in edit form, due date display on cards, overdue indicator (red), due soon indicator (amber). Date picker with calendar, relative dates supported (+7d), sort by due date.

title: 2.14 Quick Filters (Presets)
description: Predefined filter presets: My Issues, Overdue, Due This Week, Stale (no updates in 7d). Save custom presets. One-click filter, visual indicator of active preset, presets persist in local storage.

title: 2.2 Lead Time Scatterplot - Distribution visualization
description: LeadTimeChart.svelte using Layerchart. X-axis: close date, Y-axis: lead time days, point size by issue type, hover tooltip, P50/P85 percentile lines, date range selector. Points clickable, export to PNG/SVG.

title: 2.3 Throughput Chart - Items completed per period
description: ThroughputChart.svelte using Layerchart. Daily/weekly aggregation toggle, optional stacking by issue type, trend line overlay, hover shows count. Export to PNG/SVG.

title: 2.4 Cumulative Flow Diagram (CFD)
description: CFDChart.svelte using Layerchart. Stacked areas by status, X-axis date, Y-axis cumulative count, color coding, date range selector. Areas stack correctly, hover shows count per status, identifies bottlenecks.

title: 2.5 Aging WIP Scatterplot
description: AgingWIPChart.svelte using Layerchart. X-axis: current status, Y-axis: age in days, point color by priority, danger zone shading (above P85), click to view issue. Shows only open items, sorted by workflow order.

title: 2.6 Percentile Calculations - P50/P85/P95
description: Statistical percentile calculations for predictability. P50 (median), P85, P95. Display as lines on charts, summary statistics panel. Used for 'likely completion' estimates, recalculates on filter change.

title: 2.7 Health Status (RAG) Badges
description: HealthBadge.svelte component with Red/Amber/Green indicators. Health calculation logic, configurable thresholds, tooltip explaining status. Red: age > P95 or overdue, Amber: age > P85 or due soon, Green: healthy. Shows on cards and list.

title: 2.8 Progress Bars - Epic/group completion
description: ProgressBar.svelte component showing percentage complete (done/total), color gradient (red → green), tooltip with details. Shows on epic rows, updates in real-time, accessible with aria attributes.

title: 2.9 Date Prefix Parsing - Timeline placement
description: Parse date prefixes from issue titles for timeline placement. Support formats: [Q1], [Q2 2025], [H1], [W12], [Jan], [2025-03-15]. Return type, year, period, startDate, endDate. Handle year rollover, null for invalid.
